summary: The Advanced Project Management course focuses on managing data products and includes topics such as CDAIO Agile projects management, Scrum & Kanban, and data products management. It covers project and task management tools, an executive look at project management, PMI & PMO, and leading factors towards project initiation. The course also addresses mitigating key reasons for project failure, interrelationships between project, program, and portfolio, and key considerations in traditional, hybrid, and agile project management. Additionally, it explores organizational structures and their impact on project management, reviews the 10 knowledge areas and 49 project management processes, and discusses leadership styles, handling dilemmas and crises, effectiveness vs. efficiency, effective time management, project integration process, and using AI as a co-pilot for project management processes.

COURSE NAME: Advanced Project Management. 

COURSE OVERVIEW: The Advanced Project Management course focuses on managing projects in the field of data. It is designed to provide participants with the skills and knowledge necessary to effectively manage data-driven projects using various methodologies and tools. 

COURSE SCHEDULE: 
- Start Date: 13.01.2025. 
- Schedule: Mondays and Thursdays from 17:30 to 21:30. 
- Duration: 5 sessions, totaling 25 academic hours. 

LEARNING FORMAT: 
- The course is hybrid, offering the flexibility to attend classes either on-campus at Bar-Ilan University in Ramat Gan or via Zoom. 

COURSE TOPICS: 
- Advanced Project Management aimed for Data Products. 
  - CDAIO Agile projects management. 
  - Scrum & Kanban. 
  - Data products management. 
  - Project and tasks management tools. 
- Executive look at Project Management. 
  - PMI & PMO. 
  - Leading factors towards project initiation. 
  - Mitigating the key reasons for project failure. 
  - Interrelationships between Project, Program, and Portfolio. 
  - Traditional, Hybrid, and Agile Project Management key considerations. 
  - Organizational Structures and their impact on Project Management. 
  - Reviewing the 10 knowledge areas and 49 Project Management Processes. 
  - Leadership styles, handling dilemmas and crisis. 
  - Effectiveness vs. Efficiency. 
  - Effective Time Management – Prioritization, Desk Clearing, Reducing Distractions, Dynamic List. 
  - Project Integration Process. 
  - Using AI as a co-pilot for project management process. 

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: 
- To schedule an admission interview and registration, contact: 
  - Phone: 052-5886002. 
  - Email: esther.asulin@biu.ac.il. 

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: 
- The course is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University.
